chunks.text:
I hope this message finds you well. My name is Jackie from EV Lab. Anuj from Jameel Motors shared your email, and I am reaching out to seek your support regarding the reasons behind the denial of comprehensive insurance coverage for the below:

1 unit of NIO ET5.
3 units of Farizon E-vans
1 unit of Sany truck.

Currently, GIG is only able to provide Third Party Liability (TPL) coverage As per Nasco (Mridul Nambiar). Additionally, the quote for Farizon e-vans provided reflects a 7% rate with AED 10,000 as access/deductible charges for Farizon vans, which appears to be the same as the charges for Farizon test drive cars. For us, as a leasing business, these terms are not feasible.

We have been collaborating with GIG for the past three years and value this partnership. We are keen to continue working together while expanding our fleet. Could you kindly advise on how we can address this issue and work towards a mutually beneficial solution?

Looking forward to your guidance.

Best regards,
Jackie Merchant
EV Leasing & Rental
+971 58 541 4500
Building 6, The Greenhouse
Dubai Design District
Dubai, UAE

Best regards,

Jackie Merchant 
EV Leasing & Rental
+971 58 541 4500
 <https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1-Ddizmpxe9_kDi6uzmzWJjHqGqyKkU0f&export=download>

From: Jackie Merchant <jmerchant@ev-lab.io>

Cc: Kevin Chalhoub <Kevin.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>; Saadeddine Elnakib <selnakib@ev-lab.io>; Hagop Ghazarian <hagop.ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
Subject: NIO, Farizon Cargo van & Sany truck fleet insurance

 

	You don't often get email from jmerchant@ev-lab.io. Learn why this is important <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/lbtcCyJKgfK4K0BUZfLhxT2SI?domain=aka.ms>  

	

CAUTION: External Email. Do not click links or open attachments unless this email comes from a known sender and you know the content is safe.

 

Dear Dorie,

Good day to you.

I hope this message finds you well. My name is Jackie from EV Lab. Anuj from Jameel Motors shared your email, and I am reaching out to seek your support regarding the reasons behind the denial of comprehensive insurance coverage for the below:

 

1 unit of NIO ET5.

3 units of Farizon E-vans

1 unit of Sany truck.

 

Currently, GIG is only able to provide Third Party Liability (TPL) coverage As per Nasco (Mridul Nambiar). Additionally, the quote for Farizon e-vans provided reflects a 7% rate with AED 10,000 as access/deductible charges for Farizon vans, which appears to be the same as the charges for Farizon test drive cars. For us, as a leasing business, these terms are not feasible.

We have been collaborating with GIG for the past three years and value this partnership. We are keen to continue working together while expanding our fleet. Could you kindly advise on how we can address this issue and work towards a mutually beneficial solution?
